items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress. Perfect for weddings and special occasions!
items.body: I wore this dress to a spring wedding and received so many compliments! The design is absolutely gorgeous, and the color is rich, vibrant, and elegant in person. It hugs my curves in all the right places while still feeling comfortable, and I was pleasantly surprised by how well it smoothed out any imperfections without feeling tight or restrictive. For reference, I’m 5'2" and about 170 lbs. I ordered a small and it fit like a glove — super flattering! The length was just right with 4-inch heels, brushing the floor beautifully and giving that graceful, elongated look. I think a medium would have also worked if I wanted a little more room, but I was really happy with how the small fit. Get the dress!! Read more
items.author: Nataly G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: Love this dress!! Super stretchy and flattering! Wore it to a wedding in Mexico and it was perfect! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and fits good
items.body: Fit me perfectly but the design kinda made me look fat in my opinion. still a nice dress though. I'm about 5 ft 6 or 7 and weigh like 120 pounds and got a small Read more
items.author: bonnie thompson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort meets style
items.body: This is a pretty dress! The ruffles and ruching give the dress plenty of texture and detail. The way the fabric lays and flows is elegant. The material is lightweight, breathable and hugs the curves graciously. Pretty pick for your next event. Read more
items.author: Mare

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering and great for tall girls with a belly lol
items.body: The best dress I’ve bought in a long time! Very flattering for girls with a little extra tummy! The only thing I could say is the slip underneath is a little short, but I just wore slip shorts underneath and it was perfect. I might buy another color!! I love the green color so much! Read more
items.author: Madison

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Underlining
items.body: It's pretty, but the underlining keeps going up showing your butt, and the material feels VERY cheap Read more
items.author: Marilyn Hutton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit, Quality not all there
items.body: Design of the dress is nice, but quality is giving shein. Unfortunately for the price point it’s not worth it in my opinion. The straps feel flimsy but the fit of this dress is nice! Under skirt built in is pretty short so if you have a bigger behind expect it to be right at the cheek line Read more
items.author: Desiree Monroy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Khaki, White, Mauve Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Green, Coffee Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
